Submissions

Submissions get_submissions: For given course and assignment/quiz, get submissions

`get_submission_single`: Get a single submission, based on user id.

get_submissions(course_id, type, type_id)

get_submission_single(course_id, type, type_id, user_id)

Arguments

course_id

A valid canvas course id
type

Either "quizzes" or "assignments"
type_id

A valid quiz or assignment id
user_id

id of user whose submission should be retrieved

Value

Student submissions

Examples

## Not run: get_submissions(27, "quizzes", 2915)
## Not run: get_submissions(27, "assignments", 254)
get_submission_single(1350207, "assignments", 5681164, 4928217)
#> Error in canvas_query(url, args, "GET"): Unauthorized (HTTP 401).

  • Value
